snippet: Mayor Luke Ravenstahl said the shooting of the teenagers minutes after school was dismissed appeared to be “a targeted incident” rather than a random spree.
abstract: Three students are shot near a Pittsburgh high school minutes after dismissal, and police officers who surround two nearby homes take six people into custody for questioning.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Luke Ravenstahl said the shooting of the teenagers minutes after school was dismissed appeared to be “a targeted incident” rather than a random spree.

headline.main: Three Students Are Shot Near Pittsburgh School
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Three Students Are Shot Near School
